solution_line_template: The number of parrots that flew away after the noise is {initial_parrots}-{remaining_parrots} = <<{initial_parrots}-{remaining_parrots}={parrots_flew_away}>>{parrots_flew_away}

The same number of crows ({parrots_flew_away}) flew away leaving {remaining_crows} crow so there were {parrots_flew_away}+{remaining_crows} = <<{parrots_flew_away}+{remaining_crows}={initial_crows}>>{initial_crows} crows to begin with
The total number of crows and parrots was {initial_parrots}+{initial_crows} = <<{initial_parrots}+{initial_crows}={total_initial_birds}>>{total_initial_birds}
